content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case involving a claim brought by ga ge and sa against gl regarding the inheritance of gv the court ruled that the estate of gv should be divided among the parties which includes a house in albanella and a sum of money in a postal savings account an expert was appointed to evaluate the property and determined that it should be sold due to its indivisibility the court also ordered the dissolution of the community inheritance and allocated shares to the parties the costs of the case will be paid by the estate the final ruling declares the estate open and determines the distribution of assets including the sale of the house and the withdrawal of the deposited sum the court also determines the final expenses of the estate and divides them proportionally among the parties involved the case is now remitted to the examining magistrate for further proceedings
